Description.English:
One building per island fulfills the basic and luxury need of population tier in Old World, Cape Trelawney, New World, Enbesa and Artic region.

List of buildings:

Artic region
- Canteen
- Arctic Heater
- Post Office

Enbesa
- Marketplace
- Musician's Court
- Monastery

Old World and Cape Trelawney
- Palace
- Marketplace
- Pub
- Church
- School
- Variety Theatre
- University
- Bank
- Members Club
- Radio Tower
- Oil Power Plant
- Gas Power Plant
- Post Office
- Department Store
- Furniture Store
- Drug Store
- Bar
- Bus Stop
- Cafe
- The Iron Tower
- Restaurant

New World
- Marketplace
- Chapel
- Dam
- Fuel Power Plant
- Power Station
- Post Office
- Hacienda
- Chapel
- Samba School
- Beach
- Cinema
- Boxing Arena
